programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci Fi, Crime/detective ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: The Daughters of Atlas, aka Hespera, Kalypso and Anthea, arrive on Earth in search of stolen magic. The vengeful ancient gods threaten humanity, and the only brave souls standing in their destructive path are Shazam and his brightly costumed compatriots. Superhero sequel, starring Zachary Levi and Helen Mirren David F Sandberg - Director Zachary Levi - Shazam Asher Angel - Billy Batson Jack Dylan Grazer - Freddy Freeman Adam Brody - Super Hero Freddy Grace Fulton - Mary Bromfield / Super Hero Mary Helen Mirren - Hespera Lucy Liu - Kalypso Rachel Zegler - Anthea Meagan Good - Super Hero Darla Djimon Hounsou - Wizard.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sister's death. Thriller, starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman Rusty Cundieff - Director Josh Hutcherson - Franklin Fox Morgan Freeman - Anton Burrell Greg Germann - Sig Thorenson Lovie Simone - Jala Bevin Bru - Renee Renzler Sammi Rotibi - Calvert.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.sub-title: Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action horror starring Nicolas Cage. Following an apocalyptic event, single father Paul lives with his two teenage sons on an isolated homestead, forced to hide every night from the nocturnal monsters that stalk the outdoors. Though the trio has settled into a relatively stable routine, their lives are threatened when the creatures start working out how to get inside.. Benjamin Brewer - Director Nicolas Cage - Paul Jaeden Martell - Joseph Maxwell Jenkins - Thomas Sadie Soverall - Charlotte Samantha Coughlan - Mrs Rose.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Road movie starring Jamie Flatters and Keenan Munn-Francis. Outgoing London teen Nathan stumbles across his shy school friend Sam being mugged and leaps in to save him. programme.title: Polite Society
programme.desc: The bond between siblings Ria and Lena is tested when doctor Salim woos Lena and sweeps her off her feet to the visible delight of his controlling mother. A jealous and embittered Ria becomes suspicious of Salim and she vows to expose his true intentions. programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt. After a shocking on-set accident, stuntman Colt Seavers is taking some time out from the movie game. programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.sub-title: Action, Romance, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Fantasy ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Epic sci-fi drama starring Timothée Chalamet and Zendaya. With the evil Harkonnen family back in charge of Arrakis, deposed heir Paul Atreides and his mother have taken refuge with the native Fremen in the planet's perilous desert wasteland. programme.title: The Color Purple

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Crime/detective, Romance, Thriller ║ 2000 ║ 12

programme.title: The Watched
programme.sub-title: Horror, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Thriller, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Mina, a 28-year old artist, gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers that are stalked by mysterious creatures each night. Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere Ishana Shyamalan - Director Dakota Fanning - Mina / Lucy Georgina Campbell - Ciara Olwen Fouéré - Madeline Oliver Finnegan - Daniel Alistair Brammer - John John Lynch - Kilmartin Siobhan Hewlett - Mina's Mother.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Chris Pratt and Samuel L Jackson. Lazy tabby Garfield, along with his estranged dad Vic, is recruited by a vengeful Persian cat to enact a dramatic milk heist from a high-security farm Mark Dindal - Director Chris Pratt - Garfield Samuel L Jackson - Vic Nicholas Hoult - Jon Harvey Guillén - Odie Hannah Waddingham - Jinx Brett Goldstein - Roland Cecily Strong - Marge Malone.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: After 93-year-old Thelma is conned by a phone scammer, she embarks on a risky journey across LA with only one thing on her mind - revenge. Comedy, starring June Squibb, Fred Hechinger, Parker Posey, Clark Gregg and in one of his final films, Richard Roundtree Josh Margolin - Director June Squibb - Thelma Fred Hechinger - Daniel Richard Roundtree - Ben Parker Posey - Gail Clark Gregg - Alan Malcolm McDowell - Harvey Nicole Byer - Rochelle.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige Chiwetel Ejiofor - Director Jay Will - Rob Peace Mary J Blige - Jackie Peace Chiwetel Ejiofor - Skeet Douglas Camila Cabello - Naya Vazquez Michael Kelly - Father Leahy Mare Winningham - Professor Durham.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Benny's spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husband's tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler Jeff Nichols - Director Jodie Comer - Kathy Austin Butler - Benny Tom Hardy - Johnny Michael Shannon - Zipco Mike Faist - Danny Lyon Norman Reedus - Funny Sonny Boyd Holbrook - Cal Damon Herriman - Brucie Beau Knapp - Wahoo Emory Cohen - Cockroach Karl Glusman - Corky Toby Wallace - The Kid Happy Anderson - Big Jack.

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A hectic time begins for Adam Krajnak, the father of a family and the head of organized crime on Slovakian-Ukrainian borderlands. programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: Psychological horror drama starring Justice Smith and Brigette Lundy-Paine. As a child, Owen is isolated and awkward, but he finds a friend in fellow outcast Maddy, who introduces him to her favourite TV show: The Pink Opaque. This dark and sometimes troubling fantasy series exerts a strange pull on the pair, and the boundary between reality and the world of the show soon appears to blur Jane Schoenbrun - Director Justice Smith - Owen Jack Haven - Maddy Ian Foreman - Young Owen Helena Howard - Isabel Lindsey Jordan - Tara Danielle Deadwyler - Brenda Fred Durst - Frank Conner O'Malley - Dave Emma Portner - Mr Melancholy / Marco / Amanda / Evil Clown.

programme.title: ICC CT'25: AUS v ENG Hlts
programme.desc: Drawn together in Group B, rivals England and Australia go toe to toe at Lahore's Gaddafi Stadium as Jos Buttler skippers his team against the likes of Pat Cummins and Steve Smith. (22.02).

programme.title: ICC CT'25: IND v BAN Hlts
programme.desc: The 2017 finalists India compete in ICC Champions Trophy competition for the first since defeat to Pakistan at the Oval, as Rohit Sharma's side take on Bangladesh in Dubai. (20.02).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: The Betfred Super League play-off semi-finals begin with Warrington Wolves, who finished third, travelling to challenge Willie Peters' Hull KR at Sewell Group Craven Park. (04.10).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Leigh Leopards' first-ever Betfred Super League play-off semi-final sees Adrian Lam's men challenge the reigning champions Wigan Warriors, who topped the table this term. (05.10).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Hull KR make their maiden Grand Final appearance as the Robins take on the current Betfred Super League champions Wigan Warriors, who make a second successive Old Trafford outing. (12.10).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from the Betfred World Club Challenge, as the Wigan Warriors host the NRL's Penrith Panthers at the DW Stadium in one of club rugby league's biggest encounters. (24.02).

programme.title: NFL: D Lions
programme.desc: AFC East table-toppers the Buffalo Bills head to Michigan to take on the Detroit Lions, who have secured 11 victories on the bounce after a win over the Packers last Friday. (15.12).

programme.title: NFL hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a week 16 contest in the 2023 NFL, as the Dallas Cowboys go to an AFC East-leading Miami Dolphins. Miami returned to form by blowing out the Jets last week. (24.12).

programme.title: NFL hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from week 16 of the 2023 NFL season as the Denver Broncos host the New England Patriots. Denver's playoff hopes were dented in defeat to the Lions previously. (24.12).

programme.title: NFL hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Ravens and the 49ers bring an end to the Christmas Day slate of NFL games. Both sides lead their respective divisions and have secured playoff spots. (25.12).

programme.title: NFL hlts
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as week 15 of the NFL season continues with the Buffalo Bills up against the Dallas Cowboys - a side enjoying a run of five straight wins. (17.12).

programme.title: NFL Hlts
programme.desc: The Dallas Cowboys look to get back on track at AT&T Stadium as a 0-2 Baltimore Ravens pay a visit. Dallas' 16-game home winning streak went to the hands of the Saints last week. (22.09).

programme.title: S/Lge: Wakefield v Hull Kr
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Wakefield Trinity take on Hull KR. (20.02).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: In the Betfred Super League, Hull FC host Hull KR at the MKM Stadium during round one. This season, Hull FC are looking to emulate the Robins who enjoyed a successful 2023 campaign. (15.02).

programme.title: ICC CT'25: AUS v ENG Hlts
programme.desc: Drawn together in Group B, rivals England and Australia go toe to toe at Lahore's Gaddafi Stadium as Jos Buttler skippers his team against the likes of Pat Cummins and Steve Smith. (22.02).

programme.title: WTA Final: Dubai
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships, a WTA 1000 event in the United Arab Emirates. (22.02).

programme.title: WPL M2 Hlts
programme.desc: A clash from the first round of Women's Premier League contests, as last year's top two, Mumbai and Delhi, compete in Vadodara. The Capitals finished runners-up in 2024. (15.02).

programme.title: WPL'25 Hlts
programme.desc: A WPL clash between Delhi Capitals and UP Warriorz. (22.02).

programme.title: Fight Night
programme.desc: A must-win night for two British world champions on a collision course, as Natasha Jonas meets Ivana Habazin in a unification bout, while Lauren Price defends against Bexcy Mateus. (14.12).

programme.title: Fight Night
programme.desc: Joshua Buatsi and Dan Azeez's paths collide at the OVO Arena, Wembley, as the unbeaten light-heavyweight pair clash in this all-British WBA World Title Final Eliminator. (03.02).

programme.title: LIVE: NCAA Basketball
programme.desc: NC State Wolfpack host Notre Dame Fighting Irish at Reynolds Coliseum in a women's NCAA college basketball match. (23.02).

programme.title: LIVE: NCAA Basketball
programme.desc: The Louisville Cardinals welcome the North Carolina Tar Heels to the KFC Yum! Center for a women's NCAA college basketball match-up. (23.02).

programme.title: Gloves Are Off: Jonas v Price
programme.desc: British rivals Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price come face to face for a verbal confrontation ahead of their blockbuster world-title unification bout at Royal Albert Hall on Friday 7 March.

programme.title: Girlz Are Playaz Too
programme.desc: Priscilla Anyabu explores what it's like for everyday women to participate in boxing. She trains with beginners and up to the professionals. Part of the Sky Sports New Focus Fund.

programme.title: WTA Final: Dubai
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships, a WTA 1000 event in the United Arab Emirates. (22.02).

programme.title: WPL M3 Hlts
programme.desc: The Gujurat Giants open their Women's Premier League account against UP Warriorz. The two teams here failed to make last season's finals, finishing fifth and fourth respectively. (16.02).

programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game across all aspects, from the tee to the green. Here, golf star Annika Sorenstam offers tips on the full swing.
